# Vanduo Framework

> A lightweight, pure HTML/CSS/JS framework for static websites. No dependencies, no build tools, no NPM — just clean code. "Essential just like water is."

## Key Principles

- Pure HTML/CSS/JS only — no libraries, no build steps
- Modular CSS architecture — import only what you need
- Fibonacci-based spacing system for natural visual rhythm
- Dark mode with OS preference detection + manual toggle
- WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility compliance
- Mobile-first responsive design

## Quick Start

Load via CDN (no download required):
```html
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/Nostromo-618/vanduo-framework@main/dist/vanduo.min.css">
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/Nostromo-618/vanduo-framework@main/dist/vanduo.min.js"></script>
```

Pin to version for production: replace `@main` with `@v1.0.1`

## Core Systems

- [Colors](https://github.com/Nostromo-618/vanduo-framework/blob/main/css/core/colors.css): Open Color palette with CSS variables (`--color-primary`, `--color-success`, etc.)
- [Typography](https://github.com/Nostromo-618/vanduo-framework/blob/main/css/core/typography.css): Fluid typography with `clamp()`, font stacks
- [Grid System](https://github.com/Nostromo-618/vanduo-framework/blob/main/css/core/grid.css): 12-column responsive grid (`.container`, `.row`, `.col-*`)
- [Spacing](https://github.com/Nostromo-618/vanduo-framework/blob/main/css/core/spacing.css): Fibonacci-based spacing utilities (`.m-*`, `.p-*`, `.gap-*`)

## Components

- [Buttons](https://github.com/Nostromo-618/vanduo-framework/blob/main/css/components/buttons.css): `.btn`, `.btn-primary`, `.btn-outline`, sizes, states
- [Cards](https://github.com/Nostromo-618/vanduo-framework/blob/main/css/components/cards.css): `.card`, `.card-header`, `.card-body`, `.card-footer`

- [Navbar](https://github.com/Nostromo-618/vanduo-framework/blob/main/css/components/navbar.css): `.navbar`, `.navbar-fixed`, responsive mobile menu
- [Modals](https://github.com/Nostromo-618/vanduo-framework/blob/main/css/components/modals.css): `.modal`, triggered via `data-modal="#id"`
- [Dropdown](https://github.com/Nostromo-618/vanduo-framework/blob/main/css/components/dropdown.css): `.dropdown`, `.dropdown-menu`
- [Tabs](https://github.com/Nostromo-618/vanduo-framework/blob/main/css/components/tabs.css): `.tabs`, `.tab-content`
- [Tooltips](https://github.com/Nostromo-618/vanduo-framework/blob/main/css/components/tooltips.css): `data-tooltip="text"`, `data-tooltip-placement="top|right|bottom|left"`
- [Toasts](https://github.com/Nostromo-618/vanduo-framework/blob/main/css/components/toast.css): Notification system via `Vanduo.components.toast.show()`
- [Alerts](https://github.com/Nostromo-618/vanduo-framework/blob/main/css/components/alerts.css): `.alert`, `.alert-success`, `.alert-error`, dismissible
- [Badges](https://github.com/Nostromo-618/vanduo-framework/blob/main/css/components/badges.css): `.badge`, color variants
- [Avatars](https://github.com/Nostromo-618/vanduo-framework/blob/main/css/components/avatar.css): `.avatar`, sizes, status indicators
- [Chips](https://github.com/Nostromo-618/vanduo-framework/blob/main/css/components/chips.css): `.chip`, deletable chips
- [Collapsible](https://github.com/Nostromo-618/vanduo-framework/blob/main/css/components/collapsible.css): `data-collapsible` accordion/collapse
- [Skeleton](https://github.com/Nostromo-618/vanduo-framework/blob/main/css/components/skeleton.css): Loading placeholders
- [Preloader](https://github.com/Nostromo-618/vanduo-framework/blob/main/css/components/preloader.css): Page loading animation
- [Spinner](https://github.com/Nostromo-618/vanduo-framework/blob/main/css/components/spinner.css): `.spinner` loading indicator
- [Progress](https://github.com/Nostromo-618/vanduo-framework/blob/main/css/components/progress.css): `.progress`, `.progress-bar`

## JavaScript API

```javascript
// Global object
Vanduo.reinit('dropdown');     // Re-initialize component
Vanduo.destroyAll();           // Cleanup all components

// Toast notifications
Vanduo.components.toast.show({
  title: 'Success',
  message: 'Item saved.',
  type: 'success'  // success | error | warning | info
});
```

## Data Attributes

| Attribute | Purpose |
|-----------|---------|
| `data-modal="#id"` | Open modal |
| `data-dismiss="modal"` | Close modal |
| `data-tooltip="text"` | Tooltip content |
| `data-tooltip-placement="top"` | Tooltip position |
| `data-toggle="theme"` | Theme switcher (light/dark/system) |
| `data-collapsible` | Collapsible container |

## Theme Customization

Override CSS variables:
```css
:root {
  --color-primary: #6366f1;
  --font-family-base: 'Inter', sans-serif;
  --btn-border-radius: 8px;
}
```

Dark mode: set `data-theme="dark"` on `<html>` or use `data-toggle="theme"` for automatic switching.
